channel.title: API on DNS Proxy Server
channel.description: Recent content in API on DNS Proxy Server

item.title: V1 Network API
item.description: Disconnect containers from network DELETE /network/disconnect-containers HTTP/1.1 Parameters Name Type Decription netoworkId string The networkId which the containers will be disconnected from Reponse HTTP/1.1 200 [ "success for 551adbb704bf95ae73f3f8e497560609d2016d1566196298f1787f087af4b5cd", "success for 5f5ce51404b15069795006e7319f270db4f6d822a067e61808eeb0b2922087db" ] Example $ curl -X DELETE dns.mageddo:5380/network/disconnect-containers/?networkId=85e7564c6b71
